Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95, and 112 buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal; WB: 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cumberland
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
